title: New Product Launch: Custom Hot Rod Shift Knobs
description: Launch new custom machined aluminum shift knobs with laser-etched designs. Target classic hot rod enthusiasts looking for authentic period-correct parts with modern quality.

evidence.market_demand: 37% increase in 'shift knob' searches over 90 days (GA4)
evidence.competitor_analysis: Top 3 competitors average $89 price point, 4.2★ rating
evidence.inventory_readiness: Supplier confirmed 2-week lead time, MOQ 50 units

messaging.headline: Authentic Style Meets Modern Quality
messaging.cta: Pre-order now - Limited first run of 50 units

title: Evergreen Content: Hot Rod Maintenance Tips Series
description: Ongoing blog/social series covering seasonal maintenance, common fixes, and restoration tips. Drives SEO traffic and positions brand as expert resource.

evidence.seo_opportunity: 750+ monthly searches for 'hot rod maintenance' (low competition)
evidence.engagement_benchmark: Industry blogs average 3.2min read time, 45% scroll depth
evidence.content_gap: Only 2 competitors have regular maintenance content
evidence.conversion_potential: Educational content drives 23% higher lifetime value (industry avg)

content_pillars: DIY repair tutorials with product recommendations
Expert interviews with mechanics and builders

title: Wildcard: Vintage Hot Rod Calendar Collaboration
description: Partner with local hot rod club to create limited-edition 2026 calendar featuring member builds. Pre-sell to gauge demand, then use as lead magnet for new customer acquisition.

evidence.community_validation: Hot rod club has 250+ active members (potential pre-orders)
evidence.similar_campaigns: Competitor calendar sold 340 units at $24.95 in 2024
evidence.lead_gen_value: Calendars include QR codes to exclusive parts discount landing page

messaging.hook: Your Ride Could Be Famous - Submit for 2026 Calendar
messaging.unique_angle: Not just a calendar - a showcase of our community's best builds
incentive_structure: Featured builders get free calendar + $50 store credit
Bundle: Calendar + parts kit for featured car type

risk_assessment.downside_scenario: If <50 pre-orders, pivot to free PDF download lead magnet
risk_assessment.upside_scenario: If >300 pre-orders, expand to quarterly 'Hot Rod of the Month' series
risk_assessment.rollback_plan: Cancel printing, refund pre-orders, use photos for social content
